about_the_game:
In the trial version, players can try out the first 10 minutes of the first level.
Some later characters and upgrades will be locked.
detailed_description:
In the trial version, players can try out the first 10 minutes of the first level.
Some later characters and upgrades will be locked.

fullgame.name: Super Weapon Master 超级武器大师

name: Super Weapon Master Demo
short_description: You need to defeat them to collect gold coins to strengthen yourself! There will be more than 20 unique weapons, more than 30 powerful relics, and more than 80 upgrade options in the game. It is guaranteed that each game has a completely different gaming experience.
